label: RDS Parser
category: '[RDS]'

-   id: log
    label: Log
    dtype: bool
    default: 'False'
    options: ['True', 'False']
    option_labels: [Enable, Disable]
-   id: debug
    label: Debug
    dtype: bool
    default: 'False'
    options: ['True', 'False']
    option_labels: [Enable, Disable]
-   id: pty_locale
    label: PTY Locale
    dtype: int
    default: '0'
    options: ['0', '1']
    option_labels: [Europe, North America]
-   id: reset
    label: Reset
    dtype: raw
    default: '0'
    hide: part

-   domain: message
    id: in

-   domain: message
    id: out
    optional: true
